column1: The family will receive friends from 7:30 until 9:00 P.M. Sunday
column3: 2015 at Owens & Brumley Funeral Home of Burkburnett.  Funeral services will be held at 10:00 a.m. Monday
column5: 2015 at Central Church of Christ in Burkburnett with Ministers Bud Branson and Dennis Huff
column6: officiating. Interment will follow at Burkburnett Memorial Cemetery under the direction of Owens & Brumley Funeral Home of Burkburnett.
